name: Goliath
description: Philistine giant warrior from Gath, nearly 10 feet tall (six cubits and a span). Bronze armor, massive spear with shaft like a weaver's bar. Champion who defied Israel for 40 days before falling to David's sling.

champion-challenge.name: Champion's Challenge
champion-challenge.description: Goliath calling out to Israel's ranks, defying them to send a champion
champion-challenge.prompt: TOWERING GIANT nearly 10 feet tall calling out challenge to enemy army - massive bronze-armored frame, spear raised to sky, mouth open bellowing defiant challenge, bronze helmet with plume, contemptuous arrogance on bearded face, shield-bearer cowering nearby for scale

spear-thrust.name: Spear Thrust
spear-thrust.description: Goliath thrusting his massive spear forward in attack
spear-thrust.prompt: TOWERING GIANT thrusting massive spear forward - enormous bronze-tipped spear the size of a weaver's beam lunging toward enemy, nearly 10 feet of warrior muscle behind the strike, bronze scale armor gleaming, face twisted in battle fury, unstoppable killing blow

intimidating-stance.name: Intimidating Stance
intimidating-stance.description: Goliath standing in full armor, weapons ready, striking fear
intimidating-stance.prompt: TOWERING GIANT in full battle stance - nearly 10 feet tall in bronze scale armor weighing 125 pounds, bronze greaves on legs, massive spear in one hand, bronze javelin slung on back, bronze helmet with plume, cold confident expression that struck terror into armies, an army-breaker

mocking-david.name: Mocking David
mocking-david.description: Goliath scorning young David, cursing him by his gods
mocking-david.prompt: TOWERING GIANT laughing in contempt at tiny opponent - nearly 10 feet tall looking DOWN at small challenger, cruel mocking smile on bearded face, one hand gesturing dismissively, spear held casually, 'Am I a dog that you come at me with sticks?'

stone-struck.name: Stone Struck
stone-struck.description: The moment of Goliath's fall - stone sinking into forehead
stone-struck.expression: shock, the fall of a giant
stone-struck.prompt: TOWERING GIANT in moment of defeat - nearly 10 feet of warrior FALLING face-forward, stone embedded in forehead, eyes wide with shock, massive spear dropping from limp hand, bronze armor clanging, the impossible happening - a giant falls
stone-struck.energy: the bigger they are, mighty fall

roaring-threat.name: Roaring Threat
roaring-threat.description: Goliath roaring threats - promising to give flesh to birds and beasts
roaring-threat.prompt: TOWERING GIANT roaring terrifying threat - nearly 10 feet tall, head thrown back in savage roar, promising to give enemy's flesh to birds and beasts, spear raised overhead, bronze armor catching light, the stuff of nightmares, psychological warfare

advancing-doom.name: Advancing Doom
advancing-doom.description: Goliath slowly advancing toward opponent, inevitable doom approaching
advancing-doom.prompt: TOWERING GIANT advancing slowly toward enemy - nearly 10 feet tall taking deliberate menacing steps, shield-bearer before him, massive spear ready, each footstep shaking ground, patient predator who knows prey cannot escape, doom walking
